attributes.action: Close borders, put soldiers in cities for protection of us in terrorist attacks
attributes.additional_details: So many lives lost due to terrorism, and it won't stop unless something is done about it. Religion has always been a huge factor in war and it won't stop. We will never see world peace, but something has to be done to stop these attacks. I don't want our future generation to grow up in this mess. 9/11, Paris attacks, Lee Rigby, the poor man beheaded by ISIS. Please do something to stop these horrific attacks! David Cameron now is the time to actually save lives. Think of your own!
attributes.background: So many innocent lives lost in Paris need justice, and for those that live need protection. I fear attacks will happen on British soil. I fear for my life and the lives of others. Please close the borders, put our soldiers in cities, main events, stop police cuts, increase our safety.  Protect us.
